General.Name: Sunshine Agri-Tech Inc
General.Description: Sunshine Agri-Tech Inc. does not have significant operations. The company is involved in the identification, evaluation, and acquisition of interest in a business or assets. Previously, it was engaged in manufacturing, processing, packaging, and distributing livestock bio-feed products. The company was formerly known as Sunscape (Hong Kong) Limited and changed its name to Sunshine Agri-Tech Inc. in July 2010. Sunshine Agri-Tech Inc. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 2900-550 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 0A3
